channel.title: Marc O’Neill - DJ Mixes
channel.description:
web.me.com/marconeill
Electronic music mixes: house, techno, deep, melodic, soulful, music influences, etc.
channel.itunes:author: Marc O'Neill
channel.itunes:subtitle: web.me.com/marconeill Electronic music mixes: house, techno, deep, melodic, soulful, music influences, etc.

12. St. Germain - Rose Rouge

14. Silicone Soul - Right On, Right On
15. Eurythmics - Sweet Dreams (Dave Angel Remix)
